```{r}
require(readr)
require(tidyr)
require(dplyr)
data <- read_csv('flights.csv')
data <- fill(data, X1)
tbl_df(data)

```
```{r}
alaska.good = c(t(filter(data, X2 =="ontime", X1 == "ALASKA"))[3:7])
alaska.late = c(t(filter(data, X2 =="delayed", X2  =="ALASKA"))[3:7])
amwest.good = c(t(filter(data, X2 =="ontime", X1 == "AMWEST"))[3:7])
amwest.late = c(t(filter(data, X2 =="delayed", X2  =="AMWEST"))[3:7])

```

```{r}
alaska = filter(data, X1 == "ALASKA")
amwest = filter(data, X1 == "AMWEST")


```
